reviews.review_msg: He is super nice! Caring about students, get ready for exams with us together, tell us how to do well in exams follow his instruction you well at least get B+!

Two years later this prof gets a sad face. How odd. Agree to prior rating. He just likes to teach what he wants, I didn't learn a single thing in how first language is acquired waste of my $600 tuition and initial interest. All 1 in class essay, midterm, final, and paper are difficult, for he ONLY cares on HOW you right not WHAT you write. AVOID!!!

Nice person but not a good teacher. He only marks you on how you write and not what you write, so if your not a good writer with an LPI of 6 then don't even think about getting an A or anything close to it. His 72% is a C-. It is not even a Writing intensive class. Did not learn anything in the class. if you take his class make sure u have LPI 6.
He is a very tough marker.

Very well spoken and organized. He lays just about everything right one front of you. This class has a lot of material so be careful, but mellow will guide you through it really well. you can tell he really wants you to understand the material!

Dean is one of my favourite profs! He is quite clear, very concerned about giving fair tests, super helpful in office hours, very smart, really nice, and he won't make you memorize a ton of stuff you'll just forget. An all round great guy!
